title: Portfolio
text: Hello! I am Joaquin Gonzalez-Salgado, a rising Junior Engineering major at Harvey Mudd College interested in electrical and computer engineering (with appreciation for mechanical engineering.) Iâ€™m currently doing research developing an open source RISC-V verification suite for the CORE-V Wally Processor under the Clay-Wolkin Fellowship. I also work alongside the USDA as a hardware/firmware engineer focused on creating low-noise analog amplifiers for monitoring insect feeding behavior as part of the Analog Circuitry Engineering (ACE) Lab. It would be great if we could connect!
